channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m 83 and will have $500K if I sell my house. My estranged wife wants me to join her in Colombia. Do I go?
item.description: “I can just barely handle my expenses with a mortgage payment of $984 and an income of $3,800.”

item.title: ‘We can’t afford to buy a house’: My husband and I are building a house on my mother-in-law’s land. Are we asking for trouble?
item.description: “A single-family home where we live costs $600,000 or more.”

item.title: Expedia is treating AI as a friend rather than a mortal enemy — and its stock is soaring
item.description: Expedia shares climbed to a record close as the online travel agent has embraced AI to help boost business, rather than try to find ways to beat it.

item.title: As stocks wobbled, the S&P 500 held a critical threshold. Here’s what history says happens next.
item.description: The benchmark index has been above its 50-day moving average for 133 sessions, the longest streak since 2007. But that nearly came to an end on Friday...

item.title: Bitcoin rebounds after a dip into bear-market territory. Are buyers coming back for crypto?
item.description: The token’s break below $100,000 earlier this week could be a warning of more losses ahead, one analyst says.

item.title: Time to snap up Oracle, now down more than 30% in past two months, says Carter Worth
item.description: What the charts are saying about Oracle, according to Carter Worth.

item.title: Tesla shareholders passed Elon Musk's $1 trillion package. What analysts are saying
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk's new $1 trillion pay plan consists of 12 tranches of shares that would be granted if Tesla hits certain milestones.

item.title: Buy the weakness in stocks like Tesla and Palantir as bull market has more room to run, investor says

item.title: An analyst worries OpenAI will miss its 'extravagant' spending commitments. These stocks would be the most vulnerable
item.description: D.A. Davidson analyst Gil Luria pointed to a handful of AI stocks at risk if OpenAI proves incapable of following through on its deals.

item.title: Tesla fell after Musk's pay package was approved. How to play the volatility with options
item.description: Jeff Kilburg breaks down this options trade on Tesla after shareholders approved Elon Musk's $1 trillion package.
